summary:
## Green Bay Packers

The Green Bay Packers are a pro football team from Green Bay, Wisconsin, and the oldest publicly owned team in the NFL. Founded in 1919, they've won 13 league championships, the most in NFL history. They play at Lambeau Field and have famous rivals like the Chicago Bears. Despite being from a small town, they're worth billions and have a huge fan base.
title: Green Bay Packers
